self.name: msg_detailed_info
self.description:
Extended Voluntary Communication of Status of One Message.
Normally used by the server to respond to the receipt of a duplicate message ID, especially if a response to the message has already been generated and the response is large. If the response is small, the server may re-send the answer itself instead. This message can also be used as a notification instead of resending a large message.
self.descriptionExcerpt:
Extended Voluntary Communication of Status of One Message.
Normally used by the server to respond...

arguments.name: msgId
arguments.description: Original message ID that this message is informing about

arguments.name: answerMsgId
arguments.description: Message ID that was the response to that message

arguments.name: status
arguments.description: Always 0, but this may change in the future
